item.description:
sign wave - at Crowne Plaza in Nashua 6:00 PM to persuade Giuliani supporters to consider the informed and rational position of RonPaul.
see also the HQ web page and calendar for more details.


Crowne Plaza Nashua
2 Somerset Pkwy, Nashua, NH
(603) 886-1200

This is easily found from Amherst Street in Nashua by taking a right at the 101A bypass just past the plaza with Demoula's and Sears/KMart. The entrance will be a right turn off the bypass.

From Route 3 northbound, take exit 8 and at the second set of lights take a left.
item.name: sign wave at Giuliani event
